item.name: Staff
item.description: We are the only staff makers in Britannia, yet sell them for only %dgp.

item.name: Dagger
item.description: We sell the most deadly of daggers, a bargain at only %dgp each.

item.name: Sling
item.description: Our slings are made from only the finest guy and leather. 'Tis yours for %dgp.

item.name: Mace
item.description: These maces have a hardened shaft and a 5lb head fairly priced at %dgp.

item.name: Axe
item.description: Notice the fine workmanship on this axe, you'll agree %dgp is a good price.

item.name: Sword
item.description: The fine work on these swords will be the dread of thy foes, for %dgp.

item.name: Bow
item.description: Our bows are made of finest yew, and the arrows willow, a steal at %dgp.

item.name: Crossbow
item.description: Crossbows made by Iolo the Bard are the finest in the world, your for %dgp.

item.name: Flaming Oil
item.description: Flasks of oil make great weapons and creates a wall of flame too. %dgp each.

item.name: Halberd
item.description: A Halberd is a mighty weapon to attack over obstacles; a must and only %dgp.

item.name: Magic Axe
item.description: This magical axe can be thrown at thy enemy and will then return all for %dgp.

item.name: Magic Sword
item.description: Magical swords such as these are rare indeed. I will part with one for %dgp.

item.name: Magic Bow
item.description: A magical bow will keep thy enemies far away or dead! A must for %dgp!

item.name: Magic Wand
item.description: This magic wand casts mighty blue bolts to strike down thy foes, %dgp.

item.name: Cloth
item.description: Cloth Armour is good for a tight budget, Fairly priced at %dgp.

item.name: Leather
item.description: Leather Armour is both supple and strong, and costs a mere %dgp. A Bargain!

item.name: Chain Mail
item.description: Chail Mail is the armour used by more warriors than all others. Ours costs %dgp.

item.name: Plate Mail
item.description: Full Plate armour is the ultimate in non-magical armour. Get yours for %dgp.

item.name: Magic Chain
item.description: Magic Armour is rare and expensive. This chain sells for %dgp.

item.name: Magic Plate
item.description: Magic Plate Armour is the best known protection. Only we have it. Cost: %dgp.

%s says: Ah, the Black Stone. Yes I've heard of it. But, the only one who knows where it lies is the wizard Merlin.

item.descripton: %s says: For navigation a Sextant is vital... Ask for item 'D' in the Guild shops!

item.description: Now let me see... Yes it was the old Hermit... Sloven! He is tough to find, lives near Lock Lake I hear.
%s says: The last person I knew that had any Mandrake was an old alchemist named Calumny.
%s says: If thou must know of that evilest of all things... find the beggar Jude. He is very very poor!
%s says: Of Nightshade I know but this... Seek out Virgil or thou shalt miss! Try in Trinsic!

item.descripton: %s says: For navigation a Sextant is vital... Ask for item 'D' in the Guild shops!

%s says: I heard the Rune of Humility was stolen. Talk to Glarand about the Rune. He may also know about GREED.
%s says: If though must know, I hear Glorthiel herself placed a Rune of Greed in place of the original Rune!
%s says: So ye seek Black Iron. T'was found once at Latitude [K'E"] Longitude [P'B"]. It's a rare item found in the deep! Set sail and search to find the Ore.
%s says: Blasted Pirates! Thou hast better get a shovel and the lighter than air device and set off for Latitude [P'H"] Longitude [K'C"]!.

vendor.name: The Honest Inn
vendor.genericField1: We have a room with 2 beds that rents for 20gp. Take it?

vendor.name: Britannia Manor
vendor.genericField1: We have a modest sized room with 1 bed for 15 gp. Take it?

vendor.name: The Inn of Ends
vendor.genericField1: We have a very secure room of modest size and 1 bed for 10gp. Take it?

vendor.name: Wayfarer's Inn
vendor.genericField1: We have three rooms available, a 1, 2 and 3 bed room for 30, 60 and 90 gp each. 1, 2 or 3 beds?

vendor.name: Honorable Inn
vendor.genericField1: We have a single bed room with a back door for 15gp. Take it?

vendor.name: The Inn of the Spirits
vendor.genericField1: Unfortunately, I have but only a very small room with 1 bed: worse yet, it's haunted! If you do wish to stay it costs 5gp. Take it?

vendor.name: The Sleep Shop
vendor.genericField1: All we have is that cot over there. But it is comfortable, and only 1 gp. Take it?

item.name: Torches
item.description: I can give ya 5 long lasting Torches for a mere 50gp.

item.name: Magic Gems
item.description: I've got magical mapping Gems, 5 for only 60gp.

item.name: Magic Keys
item.description: Magical Keys, 1 use each, a fair price at 60gp for 6.

item.name: Sextant
item.description: So...Ya want a Sextant...Well I gots one which I might part with fer 900 gold!
